<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Header.Bitcode.Offset = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dxbc/bitcodeheader">dxbc::BitcodeHeader</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Header.Bitcode.Size = SectionSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ab9f705441a3a825d4b8a93ca4476d4e7">sys::IsBigEndianHost</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Header.swapBytes();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      W.write&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;char&gt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;Header),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
